references: Related: CF 213221, CF 213179, CF 213478, CF 213479, CF 213218. Amending: Ord 45382
summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the reozning of Lots 9 and 10, Block 3, Ayer and O'Hara's Addition; Lots 4, 5 and 6, Block 3, Sprague's Addition; Lots 1 to 7 inclusive, Block 2, Thumn and Moore's Subdivision of Maple Leaf Addition to Green Lake Circle and vacated 21st Avenue N.E. adjoining; west 40 feet of Lots 9 and 10, Block 3, Bigelow's Addition; and Lots 5 to 8 inclusive, Block 96, McNaught's Addition to Central Seattle; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-299 and 17-244, respectively.
